"In Desdemona,any showing of intellect or active will would have injured the dramatic effect." Thus,not a role to,uh,die for.
#Shakespeare
@DrWellsAtESU And "Shut up, Shane!", I wouldn't blame you for muttering right about now. #ButIWasNotTakingThePissISwearMilady
@DrWellsAtESU Courage! And once more into the breach, good Doctor! And...lay on MacDuff, and damned be she who first cries "Hold, enough"
@DrWellsAtESU Does it make it better or worse that it's April Fool's Day?
@DrWellsAtESU Hope you don't have to teach tomorrow, darlin'. If you do, at least it'll be only a 1-glass hangover. And what a great story!
@DrWellsAtESU Somewhere Will is having a good laugh. And my Irish rebel ancestors are whirling in their graves that I'm taken for a Brit!
@DrWellsAtESU #IAmTremenjouslyFlatteredMyDearAndAlmostWishIHadPerpetuatedYourIllusionToThePointOfCaddishness
@DrWellsAtESU Now I laugh, but ruefully, and at myself. Did I use English spellings,or what? There's a good farce here! Pinter! But lighter.
@DrWellsAtESU The same thing you were doing, more or less. Don't tell me you thought I was from England. Christ, I bet you're disappointed!
@DrWellsAtESU LordstownOH, perchance?I high-schooled in Akron,erstwhile Rubber Capital of the World. You could prolly smell it in Lordstown.
@DrWellsAtESU  Speaking as Rosalind of Arden Forest or as Beatrice of Padua(it is Padua, right?I type too slowly to google and keep with you
@DrWellsAtESU Yet another attraction! #BoysWillBeBoys
@DrWellsAtESU But what is the ability to can? Perhaps you don't know you have it until you lose it?
@DrWellsAtESU Holly, I am "only" smiling and have been for a couple of hours now.With you; not at you. And it's me making all the typos!
@DrWellsAtESU I knew you did. But I did mean Rosalind. Wittier than Beatrice; not as defensive; more fun.
@DrWellsAtESU For your wit; not for any crossdressing you may or may not do. #NotThatTheresAnythingWrongWithThat
@DrWellsAtESU  Haven't done this much riffing sans cannabis sativa since the Clinton Administration. I dub thee #TheRosalindOfEffortPA
@DrWellsAtESU "Mistake"?!?! What mitake? #OutLikeALyin
@DrWellsAtESU #SaveYouselves3ExclamationPoints
@DrWellsAtESU Are you wondering if I misspelled "neglect" on purpose? I will say only that I would like you to think that I did.
@DrWellsAtESU That was my intention, but I negected to proof it. #TakingThePiss
@DrWellsAtESU Or even the Algonquin Ropund Table.
@DrWellsAtESU Things would be different if the Algonquin Round Table were still alive! #AlgonquinRopundTable
@DrWellsAtESU Why aren't followers aren't jumping in on these  #Hashtags. Blocks! Things of Stone! #NotTakingThePissReBlocksAndStoneThings
@DrWellsAtESU Thank you. Certainly it is the finest poem I have written today. #DoThinkYouAreTakingThePissThoughButThatsOK
@DrWellsAtESU "Pelter", being, of course, a fire-new word for a taker of pelts.
@DrWellsAtESU That kinda ursine won't set ya to cursin'/Unless you're a pelter/Who prefers somethin' svelter.
@DrWellsAtESU Trying for pun on "ursine" and coming up dry. Post-prandial synapse shutdown. Care to have a go? I promise not to groan.
@DrWellsAtESU I fear no bears, being rather sinewy, and always possessed of a Snickers bar or two to toss 'em as a distraction.
@DrWellsAtESU Splendid Bear! If I ever have to exit pursued by a bear, (s)he's the one for me.
@DrWellsAtESU That's what they'd have you believe.
@DrWellsAtESU Get a grip, woman! Do you not live in a town called Effort? "Bear up and board 'em!"
@DrWellsAtESU "[O]ne of those March days... when it is summer in the light and winter in the shade." Only worse, apparently, in Effort PA.
@DrWellsAtESU Out like a lioness....
